item.title: Bell Badminton Club 2024/2025 Season
item.author: test@example.com (Web Author)
item.description: Hello Bell badminton shuttlers, Time sure flies when we are having fun! We canâ€™t believe two months have already gone by since we started the season. Here are a few updates as we head into the busy holiday season: Additional Gym Cancellations Unfortunately, we have recently been notified by the school board that the following days have been cancelled due to school events: April 11, 2025 May 30, 2025 Holiday Party We will be hosting a holiday party on December 20, 2024 inside the gym.

item.title: New Cancellations
item.author: test@example.com (Web Author)
item.description: Hello Bell badminton shuttlers, Hope everyone is enjoying the season so far. We’ve received a notice from the school board that the following bookings have been cancelled: Please make note of the following cancellations where there will be NO badminton play: April 11, 2025 May 30, 2025 This means that our new last day of badminton will be May 23rd, 2025 See you all tonight, Bell Badminton Club

item.title: Bell Badminton Club 2024/2025 Season
item.author: test@example.com (Web Author)
item.description: Hello Bell badminton shuttlers, Hope everyone had a fantastic summer. The Bell Badminton Club 2024/2025 season will be starting on Friday, September 20, 2024 at 6:00 p.m. We play every Friday from 6:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m.; however, we kindly ask everyone to stop playing at 9:45 p.m. to help clean-up and to put away the equipment. Cancellations Please make note of the following cancellations where there will be NO badminton play:
